The goal floor ‘#’ is located at (row=14, col=15), adjacent to the avatar's position. Our immediate goal is to reach the green goal sprite one step to the right.

Since the avatar can take actions to the right (ACTION_RIGHT=2), I will execute the right movement and expect to reach the goal:

``` Action:2 ```

By moving right, I aim to step directly onto the goal sprite and successfully complete the objective of the level.
